author: Joseph Guzman
title: Pastor arrested for holding church services despite coronavirus 'safer at home' order - The Hill
description: Pastor arrested for holding church services despite coronavirus 'safer at home' order The Hill Police arrest Florida pastor for holding church services despite stay-at-home order CNN Florida megachurch pastor arrested for holding crowded services Sunday Fox N…
content:
A Tampa, Fla., megachurch pastor who continued to hold packed church services despite a Safer At Home order was arrested Monday. 
Pastor Rodney Howard-Browne was arrested on misdemeanor charges of unlawful assembly and violation of public health rules after … [+2133 chars]
